newsitem.title: USA: IMC Mortgage Co Q1 shr diluted $0.34.
newsitem.headline: IMC Mortgage Co Q1 shr diluted $0.34.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: All per share figures reflect a 2:1 stock split paid on Feb 13, 1997.
NOTE: Loans originated or purchased during the first quarter of 1997 totaled $818 million, an increase from $264 million during the first quarter of 1996.
NOTE: Effective January 1, 1997, IMC closed the acquisitions of Mortgage America, located in Michigan, CoreWest Banc, located in Los Angeles, and Equity Mortgage located in Maryland.

NOTE: Effective February 1, 1997, IMC also closed the acquisition of American Mortgage Reduction, located in Maryland. These four companies originated approximately $130 million of primarily retail production in the fourth quarter of 1996, of which IMC purchased approximately $36 million.
